title: of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 

1961 (Judicial Remuneration) (Section 46(9)) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited court (supplemental provisions) act 1961 (judicial remuneration) (section 46(9)) order 2021

title: of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961),
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 1 July 2021.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 1 July 2021.

title: of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961),
heading: 3. This Order applies to a judge whose appointment to the judicial office
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a judge whose appointment to the judicial office 
concerned occurred before the commencement of section 10 of the Financial 
Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Amendment) Act 2011 (No. 39 of 
2011).
text_norm: 3 order applies judge whose appointment judicial office concerned occurred commencement section 10 financial emergency measure public interest (amendment) act 2011 (no 39 2011)

title: of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961),
heading: 4. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a
text_raw:
4. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a 
judicial office specified in column (1) of the Schedule is the sum specified in 
column (2) of that Schedule opposite the judicial office specified in column (1). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [323] 3
text_norm: 4 annual sum payable way remuneration judge holding judicial office specified column (1) schedule sum specified column (2) schedule opposite judicial office specified column (1) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th july 2021 323 3

SCHEDULE

remuneration

a specialist judge of the Circuit Court
